name: DeleteAttachment
description:
Delete a specific attachment in Asana.

Use this tool to delete an existing attachment in Asana by providing the attachment's unique ID. Requires `attachments:delete` scope.

parameters.name: attachment_unique_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the attachment to be deleted.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the attachment.

parameters.name: pretty_output_enabled
parameters.description: Set to true to return the response in a readable format with line breaks and indentation. Use for debugging, as it increases response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

parameters.name: attachment_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the attachment.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the attachment.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
